thread.title: Most terrifying bridge in the WORLD: 590ft high suspension bridge made of GLASS opens
thread.title_full: Most terrifying bridge in the WORLD: 590ft high suspension bridge made of GLASS opens

title: Most terrifying bridge in the WORLD: 590ft high suspension bridge made of GLASS opens
text:
Most terrifying bridge in the WORLD: 590ft high suspension bridge made of GLASS opens Most terrifying bridge in the WORLD: 590ft high suspension bridge made of GLASS opens DON'T look down, tourists are not able to cross one of the scariest attractions in the world - a suspension bridge made entirely of GLASS. PUBLISHED: 12:30, Thu, Sep 24, 2015 | UPDATED: 12:41, Thu, Sep 24, 2015 CEN Is this the scariest bridge in the world 
The bridge, 300 metres long made has opened crossing Shiniuzhai National Geopark. 
Tourists today visited the glass-bottomed bridge that sits 180 metres (590ft) above the ground in Pingjiang county. 
The bridge, which according to some, sways in the wind when you cross it, spans a chasm at the national park. 
It is proving particularly popular with brave tourists for its unique rock formations and geography. 
Walkers can see clear, stomach-churning views of the ground 180 metres below. REX Visitors were invited onto the bridge, which gives an unobstructed view of the terrifying 180-metre- 
Park management authorities added a small section of glass last year, but decided to transform the entire length of the crossing. 
The floor is made of a double layer of glass and is just 24 mm thick. 
People using the creaking wooden structure in the past were told they needed nerves of steel and to be "true men" to brave the structure, and now tourism chiefs reckon that is even more the case with the glass bottom. 
Eleven workers laboured 12 hours a day to convert the former wooden bridge into the new structure, reinforced with thick layers of glass and a metal frame. REX The bridge is 590ft above the ground REX A family crosses the scary bridge in China Related articles
